title: Facebook boycott: View the list of companies pulling ads
text: A growing list of companies say they'll join an advertiser boycott on Facebook in protest of what they say are the site's failures to stop the spread of hate.

title: Facebook VP on ad boycott: We have 'no incentive' to allow hate speech
text: Facebook is facing an advertising boycott unlike anything the company has experienced in recent history. A growing list of advertisers have signed onto the #StopHateForProfit campaign, protesting what they say are Facebook's failures to stop the spread of hate.

title: Facebook’s Zuckerberg was reportedly talked out of making moves against Trump as far back as 2015
text: Facebook Inc. Chief Executive Mark Zuckerberg reportedly wanted to remove an incendiary post by then-candidate Donald Trump as far back as 2015, but was convinced instead to change Facebook’s rules to allow such posts in the name of political discourse.

title: Facebook and Google should audit algorithms that boost fake news, say UK Lords
text: Democracy is under threat from a "pandemic of misinformation," warns a report published by a UK parliamentary committee on Monday.

title: Apple, Google, Amazon and Facebook bet on gaming. Here's how they've done so far
text: Almost every tech giant has its sights on gaming. Even Apple and Google, predominantly known for their hardware and operating systems, have made big bets in games.

title: Exclusive: Facebook ad boycott campaign to go global, organizers say
text: Organizers of a Facebook Inc advertising boycott campaign that has drawn support from a rapidly expanding list of major companies are now preparing to take the battle global to increase pressure on the social media company to remove hate speech.

title: Facebook Shares Drop As Starbucks, Verizon Join The Escalating Boycott
text: Over 100 companies have announced a boycott of Facebook—and Starbucks is the latest.

title: Pepsi joining Facebook ad boycott, Fox Business News reports
text: PepsiCo Inc will stop advertising on Facebook Inc , Fox Business News reported https://www.foxbusiness.com/markets/pepsi-facebook-ad-boycott on Sunday, citing sources.

title: 3 Rock-Solid Growth Stocks to Own in a Stock Market Crash
text: These time-tested growth stocks won't bat an eye if stock market volatility returns.
